description: This file implements the Http Simple Server Object's interface functions specifically for handling WSP (Web Service Protocol) within an HTTP server context. It includes basic accept and serve functions with default behavior, and contains license and module information.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSsoWspAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hClientInfo)
methods.description: Determines whether the server accepts the incoming client connection based on the client info. Currently always returns TRUE.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSsoWspServe(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hWebsSession,ANSC_HANDLE hWebsTrans,ANSC_HANDLE hMessage)
methods.description: Handles processing of a web session, transaction, and message. Currently implemented as a stub with no processing, always returns success.
